text: Hi Y'all! I've been looking at some videos for previous meetups, and I was wondering if y'all think it would be fun to run one here in Atlanta. If so, do you have any tips for organizing one? Or people to get in contact with? Also, if you're in the ATL area and are interested in attending, react with :hotsprings: !
